---
title: Sandbox
---
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Sandbox: Physical cards

## Simulate activating a physical card {#simulate-activating}

:::tip Prerequisites
The card you're activating must have the status `Enabled`. 
:::

### Step 1: Get the `physicalCardIdentifier` {#simulate-activating-identifier}

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="cards" label="🖥️ Dashboard">
    <div>
        <ol>
<li>On your Dashboard, go to **Developers** > **Event Simulator**.</li>
<li>Open **Cards**, then go to the **Physical card reception** tab.</li>
<li>Enter your `cardId`, then click **Simulate**.</li>
<li>The simulator returns the `physicalCardIdentifier`.</li>
</ol>
<img src={require("../../../images/topics/cards/cards-physical-simulate-activation.png").default} alt="Screenshot of Dashboard to simulate physical card reception" />
  </div>
  </TabItem>
<TabItem value="accounts" label="⚙️ Testing API" default>
    <div>
        <ol>
    <li>Call the Testing API > [`physicalCardReception` mutation](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D&tab=test-api).</li>
<li>Enter the `cardId`.</li>
<li>The API returns the `physicalCardIdentifier` in the payload.</li>
</ol>
    </div>
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Step 2: Activate the Sandbox card {#simulate-activating-activate}

1. Use the API Explorer > [`activatePhysicalCard` mutation](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D%3D&tab=api).
1. Add the `physicalCardIdentifier` you received from the Testing API or the Dashboard.
1. Use the `consentUrl` provided in the payload to consent to activating the card.
